body:
Thank you Robert. I´ve installed the latest version of OpenStudio (0.8.3) and the DaylightSim Ruby 
script seems working well. The simulation with --dcts option ends without the prevoius Windows 
"Gendaylit error" but when I open the annual daylight illuminance profile (.ill) to check 
simulation results there are only the direct normal illuminance and the diffuse horizontal 
illuminance values. No results about daylight sensor illuminance and point illuminance.
Do you think could be a problem with the illuminance map modeled in SketchUp or again with 
Gendaylit?
Looking forward to hear from you!


Silvia






On Fri, 24 Aug 2012 08:53:31 -0600
  "Guglielmetti, Robert" <Robert.Guglielmetti at nrel.gov> wrote:
